wikipedia_page.main: Professor Margaret "Meg" Stacey (27 March 1922 – 10 February 2004) was a British sociologist and a leading figure in the establishment of Sociology as an academic discipline.

response: **Margaret Stacey, British sociologist and pioneer in developing medical sociology as a subset of her discipline at the University of Warwick (d. 2004)
